text: Robert Alan Morse (May 18, 1931 – April 20, 2022) was an American actor and singer. He was known for his role in the musical and movie of How to Succeed in Business Without Really Trying. He was also known for his role as Bertram Cooper in Mad Men. He won a Drama Desk Award, two Tony Awards, a Screen Actors Guild Award, and an Emmy Award. He also played Dominick Dunne in The People v. O. J. Simpson: American Crime Story (2016). Morse was born on May 18, 1931 in Newton, Massachusetts. Morse was married to Carol Ann D'Andreá from 1961 until they divorced in 1981. He later married Elizabeth Robert in 1989. They had five children.
